title: 如何获取玩家背包中的宝可梦数量
author: Rinbin
txt_content: 去看了API，始终没找到，找哭了~ 想问如何获取玩家现在背包中有多少只宝可梦

replies.author: 天辉胡萝卜
replies.txt_content:
PlayerStorage ps = PixelmonStorage.PokeballManager.getPlayerStorage((EntityPlayerMP)p);
int count = ps.partyPokemon.length;复制代码

replies.author: Rinbin
replies.txt_content:
疾风暗影 发表于 2020-6-9 05:26
感谢大佬一大早就来回复，感谢帮助
